title: 1.13局域网联机怎么关pvp？
author: Shan_Ya_77
txt_content:
原先可用下面这些指令关闭，1.13用不了了，求解
/scoreboard teams add pvp pvp/scoreboard teams option pvp friendlyfire false/scoreboard teams join pvp @a

replies.author: 极光战神伍
replies.txt_content:
/team add pvp {"text":"pvp"}
/team modify pvp friendlyFire false
/team join pvp @a
安利spu

replies.txt_content:

/team option pvp friendlyfire false
